title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: ICT-Integrated Practical Course for Developing Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience using office software
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex social problems according to the computational thinking framework (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithm design).
Learners can simulate and optimize problem-solving strategies using ICT tools (collaboration platforms, data visualization tools, etc.).
Learners can design digital solutions applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
